Name: Kronk
Text: Redline? Redline! Why is Redline in Kronk Manor

Name: Redline
Text: I don't get why you call it that. It's the University's Presidents Manor. It's not like it was yours to begin with.

Name: Kronk
Text: Fast lady is right. This wasn't Kronks...

Name: Redline
Text: You know what Kronk. I'm off. Toodles..

Name: Redline
Text: Have fun! Oh yeah, command said to hurry up and conquer University.
